name: ruby19
long_description:
# ruby19 cookbook

Installs Ruby 1.9.x from source.


## Cookbook Requirements

* apt
* build-essential


## Attributes

* `ruby/version`: string containing the ruby version you want to install.
  Default: "1.9.3-p194"


## Recipes

* `ruby19`: installs Ruby from source.
